## Report category (check all that apply)
- [ ] Impersonation / fake identity
- [ ] No real identity or proof
- [ ] Vague budget / unclear use of funds (e.g., “marketing” with no details)
- [ ] Pressure tactics (e.g., “donate now or else”)
- [ ] Recipient address mismatch (doesn’t match claimed entity)
- [ ] Suspicious links / phishing / malware
- [ ] Spam / misleading marketing
- [ ] Other (explain below)

---

## Severity (pick one)
- [ ] Low (minor concern / needs review)
- [ ] Medium (multiple warning signs)
- [ ] High (strong scam indicators)
- [ ] Critical (active phishing / funds at immediate risk)
